content.rendered:
Transforming Your Vision into a Timeless Architecture Project

Our Architecture Services

Passion, teamwork, and innovation underpin all our architecture services. We start every architecture project with a detailed meeting to understand our new clients' needs and expectations. Our team collaborates to ensure that each project benefits from the skills and commitment of our team. This collaboration helps shape our identity.

To provide the best architectural designs and development, we first listen carefully to your goals. We offer the best building designs that meet and surpass your ambitious dreams. When you experience our teamwork, expertise, accountability, and innovation firsthand, you can be sure of a quality finished project.

Innovative Services Tailored to Your Architecture Project Requirements

At , we pride ourselves on delivering a wide range of architecture services that cater to your diverse needs. Whether you need a commercial architect in or an architect for home renovation, our team is here to bring your vision to life with precision and creativity.

Residential Architecture and Multi-Unit Developments

Need a dependable residential architect in ? No sweat. Even though our speciality is modern architecture, we don’t shy away from well-done traditional projects. Successfully completing a plethora of residential projects over the years, we provide new custom homes, interior design, interior additions and renovations, townhouses, and condo buildings. We also provide multi-unit developments, retirement homes, residential care facilities, and hospitality venues.

01
Commercial Architecture, Civil & Industrial

Looking for commercial architects in the GTA and Southern Ontario? You’re in the right place. Over the years, we’ve been very fortunate to have worked on many different types of civil, industrial, and commercial architecture projects in-province. These include tenant fit-outs, interior additions and renovations, office buildings, retail buildings, medical buildings, public washrooms, daycares, and warehouses.

02
Custom Built Homes

When you want your neighbourhood property to stand out from the crowd, hire for custom built homes. When your family’s lifestyle and needs call for building solutions beyond the norm, we design custom built homes to our clients’ exact requirements and wishes. This way, they can relax and unwind in the property they’ve always dreamed about.

03

Residential Architecture and Multi-Unit Developments

Looking for a dependable residential architect in ? We've got you covered. While modern architecture is our specialty, we excel in traditional projects too. Over the years, our architecture company has successfully completed a wide range of residential projects.

Our design services and construction projects include custom homes, interior design, renovations, townhouses, and condo buildings. We also handle multi-unit developments, retirement homes, residential care facilities, and hospitality venues.

Read more

Residential Architecture and Multi-Unit Developments

Permit Applications

In addition to Ontario architectural design, we also offer comprehensive services related to development applications. This includes site plan approval, zoning certificates, building permits, Committee of Adjustment, conservation, and regional approvals.

Our expertise in these areas ensures that your design buildings meet all regulatory requirements, allowing the building process to move forward smoothly. We guide you through each step, streamlining the path from concept to construction.

Read more

Permit Applications

Commercial Architecture, Civil & Industrial

We are your experienced commercial architects in the GTA and Southern . Over the years, we’ve designed civil, industrial, and commercial buildings throughout the province. Our projects include tenant fit-outs, interior additions and renovations, retail and office buildings, medical facilities, public washrooms, daycares, and warehouses.

We specialize in the design and construction process, ensuring each project meets the highest standards. Our approach guarantees that every building is designed with precision and innovation.

Read more

Commercial Architecture, Civil & Industrial

Site Planning

For larger developments and multi-residential projects, take advantage of our comprehensive site planning service. Our architectural site plans include documents such as graphic descriptions, floor plans, scale drawings, and other essential sketches. These resources are invaluable in helping you accurately envision your dream property.

Additionally, we conduct thorough site visits to ensure every detail aligns with your vision before moving into the construction phase. We ensure a smooth transition from planning to construction, bringing your project to life with precision.

Read more

Site Planning

Interior Design

Whether you are enhancing your current home or planning a future one, your Ontario interior design needs are in expert hands with . We believe a home achieves true harmony when the interior and exterior are seamlessly integrated.

With over 60 years of combined industry experience, our dynamic duo collaborates closely with our architectural team to deliver fully integrated architect services. When you hire an architect from , you are choosing a team dedicated to creating spaces that perfectly reflect your vision.

Read more

Interior Design

Feasibility Studies

Sometimes, clients need to determine what can be built on their property to maximize financial returns or make informed decisions about acquiring land or a building. We offer feasibility studies to assist you with that. Architects typically consider factors like the Ontario Building Code and regulations.

By doing so, we can prepare detailed plans and sketches that accurately illustrate how the site or building can be developed into functional living spaces. Our goal is to ensure that every project is both financially viable and perfectly aligned with your vision.

Read more

Feasibility Studies

Permit Applications

In addition to Ontario architectural design, we also offer services related to development applications. This includes site plan approval, zoning certificates, building permits, Committee of Adjustment, conservation, and regional approvals.

05
Site Planning

For larger developments and multi-residential projects, we recommend you take advantage of our site planning service. Architectural site plans include many documents that prove helpful throughout the building process. Graphic description, floor plans, scale drawings and other sketches all play an important role in you envisioning your dream property more accurately.

06
Feasibility Studies

Sometimes, clients need to know what exactly they can build on their property to maximize financial returns. Or alternatively, decide about acquiring land or a building. We provide feasibility studies to help our valued clients make important decisions like these. We always take the Ontario Building Code and all regulations into consideration. This way, we can prepare plans and sketches to accurately illustrate how the site or building can be properly developed.

07
Feasibility Studies

Sometimes, clients need to know what exactly they can build on their property to maximize financial returns. Or alternatively, decide about acquiring land or a building. We provide feasibility studies to help our valued clients make important decisions like these. We always take the Ontario Building Code and all regulations into consideration. This way, we can prepare plans and sketches to accurately illustrate how the site or building can be properly developed.

07
Interior Design

We believe a home is only in perfect harmony when the interior and exterior seamlessly complement each other. We have over 20 years of experience providing professional Ontario interior design services. Our knowledgeable and on-trend interior designers work closely and in collaboration with our architectural team in a fully integrated approach.

04

Don’t wait! Discuss your dream build now.

WHAT CLIENTS SAY

“Working with was amazing. is a great person to work with and he helped me design my dream house. He always listens and provides great feedback. I would highly recommend working with this business!”

Gurjit S.

What Clients Say

“Working with was amazing. is a great person to work with and he helped me design my dream house. He always listens and provides great feedback. I would highly recommend working with this business!”

Gurjit S.
Google my Business

“We chose based on a referral from a friend and builder. Our experience dealing directly with has been very rewarding as we enjoy the patience and professionalism that their team provides. We shared our big picture dream, and the team has made it a reality and now it is time to submit to the city for permits. Very exciting.”

GS
Google my Business

“Totally impressed!! I have had a pleasure working with from As a professional Architect, he listens carefully and understands your taste and needs and while his fee is fair, he's totally professional and responsive. He'll sure get the design of your dream home done, above and beyond your expectations. I cannot say enough good things about , but all in all, it was a pleasure working with him and I look forward to working with him in the future.”

R Daneshvar
Google my Business

“I have known for several years and have hired his services for 2 residential and one commercial jobs. He is very professional, has great ideas and is responsive to adjustments and innovative concepts. has always been fair with pricing and pays attention to the fine details required. His company is 5 stars in my books!”

Paul M.
Google my Business

“ patiently worked with us to explore the different possibilities on a variety of projects that included commercial properties and residential subdivisions. They carefully took the time to explain the process in its entirety and demonstrated a continued dedication towards maintaining a transparent and collaborative client-architect relationship. We are appreciative of the help, and we have a great deal of respect both for the work the firm does as well as for and the rest of the team.”

Ghazawan
Google my Business

“ is a brilliant architect who has a real eye for design! I have worked with him personally and found him and his firm to be most accommodating and wanting to go that extra mile. His insight is invaluable to anyone wanting to design their dream home.”

Dan C
Google my Business

“We have been working with for almost two years, they have designed a Banquet Hall for us, they are very professional and responsive to every question we have. We are almost getting our permit and we had a lot of help from them to achieve our goal. I would highly recommend them.”

Nada M
Google my Business

“ and his team designed a new home for our family in Mississauga/Mineola West area. managed the whole process (Site Plan Approval, Committee of Adjustments, Building Permits) and delivered every step of the way. We were satisfied with his services, and he did great work overall.”

Massimo N
Google my Business
A few Cities where our firm is proud to have done projects
